document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala is in a statistical tie with right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori ahead of peru's presidential election decider on june 5, a datum poll showed on sunday.
document.title: datum peru poll shows virtual tie in run-off vote
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala is in a statistical tie with right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori ahead of peru's presidential election decider on june 5, a datum poll showed on sunday.
